entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing before morning. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
